                        announced a number of promotional measures in the previous ten years, including tax incentives
                        for electric vehicle owners, public EV charging infrastructure development, and so on. Timeline for various initiatives taken by policymakers and regulators: 1.Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of (Hybrid and) Electric
